name: MVVMToolkit
summary: A modern, fast, modular MVVM library and part of the Windows Community Toolkit.
author: Microsoft Community

name: Prism.Avalonia
summary: Cross-platform MVVM framework to quickly implement navigation, dialogs, and event messaging.

name: ReactiveUI
summary: Cross-platform MVVM framework for all .NET platforms that is inspired by functional reactive programming.
author: ReactiveUI team
